description:
The loan approval asset exposes one endpoint which takes loan amount
The current salary which the user is withdrawing
based on that it will calculate and return the final amount
Endpoint : http://169.51.206.174:32518
Documentation : URL
api : validateLoan
samplecode:
axios.get('http://169.51.206.174:32518/validateLoan?loan=5000&income=5000').then(resp => {console.log(resp.data);})
